root: ^Gather 'round, all ye seekers of beauty and truth,
^For I bring you words that will stir your soul and ignite your youth.
^I am but a humble poet, with verses to sell,
^But within these lines, lies magic that no coin can quell.
^Step right up, my friends, and take a piece of my soul,
^For within these pages, you'll find stories that make you whole.
^I offer you my verses, with love and with grace,
^For in sharing my poetry, I find my rightful place.
